song.chordSequence: C F C F G C C F C F G D C
song.lyrics:
C F C This is a boring test song [Dies is ein Test-Lied] F which has multiple lines [das mehrere Zeilen hat] G C in each verse [in jeder Strophe]
C F C But see the other test song [Aber sieh Dir das andere Test-Lied an] F I'm sure it will be [ich bin sicher, es wird] G D C much much better [viel, viel besser sein]
song.title: Test Song

song.lyrics:
This app is used to display the data produced by Song Database, an open source software which you can get at https://zephyrsoft.org/sdb
You have to upload the file "songs.xml" to a place which is publicly accessible so this app can display the data in it.
You can also use a synchronization solution like Nextcloud (see https://nextcloud.com).
If you use Song Database but are unsure how to upload your songs and access it with this app, you are welcome to write me an email. My contact details are at https://zephyrsoft.org/contact-about-me
song.title: How This App Is Used
